SEARCH
Package cn.nukkit.entity

Class Attribute

java.lang.Object
cn.nukkit.entity.Attribute
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
public class Attribute extends Object implements Cloneable
属性是作用于Entity上一个的增益/减益系统。

Attributes are buffs/debuffs systems that act on Entity.

Since:
Nukkit 1.0 | Nukkit API 1.0.0

    • toNBT

      public static CompoundTag toNBT(Attribute attribute)
      将这个Attribute转换成NBT

      Convert this attribute to NBT

      like 

       {
     "Base": 0f,
     "Current": 0f,
     "DefaultMax": 1024f,
     "DefaultMin": -1024f,
     "Max": 1024f,
     "Min": -1024f,
     "Name": "minecraft:luck"
 }
      Parameters:
      attribute - the attribute
      Returns:
      the compound tag

    • fromNBT

      public static Attribute fromNBT(CompoundTag NBT)
      从NBT获取Attribute

      Get the Attribute from NBT

      like 

       {
     "Base": 0f,
     "Current": 0f,
     "DefaultMax": 1024f,
     "DefaultMin": -1024f,
     "Max": 1024f,
     "Min": -1024f,
     "Name": "minecraft:luck"
 }
      Parameters:
      NBT - the nbt
      Returns:
      the attribute
